Series II. Commercially Distributed Audiovisual Materials [RESTRICTED]
Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
The March of Time: American Lifestyles 1939-1950: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
The March of Time: American Lifestyles 1939-1950: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
One box set with six videocassettes. Included in the set:
1 videocassette (VHS) (73 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 Show Business: The War Years 1939-1945"
1 videocassette (VHS) (92 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 Show Business: The Postwar Years 1946-1950"
1 videocassette (VHS) (89 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 The American Family: The War Years 1941-1945"
1 videocassette (VHS) (89 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 The American Family: The Postwar Years 1946-1948"
1 videocassette (VHS) (90 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 America's Youth 1940-1950"
1 videocassette (VHS) (105 min): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents American Lifestyles 1939-1950 American Fashion and Leisure 1945-1950"
